subject: College Athletics
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Rochester Institute of Technology advanced to the Frozen Four for the first time, beating New Hampshire, 6-2, in the N.C.A.A.  East Regional final in Albany.
snippet: Rochester Institute of Technology advanced to the Frozen Four for the first time, beating New Hampshire, 6-2, in the N.C.A.A.  East Regional final in Albany.
